TopicTitle: Symbols for writing and editing CFG

Articles.Content:
Good day.
Tell me what symbols are used for CFG editing.
For example, I know that the symbol - @ - changes the meaning
character -! - turns off, but I'm not sure since I haven't used it.
What other symbols are used, where can I find information on this?

 

I think I found what I was looking for in the section -

https://github.com/sarbian/ModuleManager/wiki/Module-Manager-Syntax

 

Edited August 18, 2020 by Useless_useR
